# Add A New Client

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/add-a-new-client/

## Category
04 Clients

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CLIENTS
CLIENT LIST
Adding and Deleting Clients
IN THIS ARTICLE
Adding new clients in the Clients app
Adding new clients when creating an appointment
Deleting clients

You can add new clients in the Clients app and when creating an appointment from the calendar.

Note: 

Clients will also be added to your client list when they book appointments online. This can include clients who enter their information online but do not finish booking after being prompted for their credit card information or a pre-payment/deposit.

Link copied
Adding new clients in the Clients app

To create a new client in the Clients app, select Add Client.

If client ownership is enabled, you can select the staff member who "owns” the client from the Owner dropdown.

Learn more about the client details you can add for each client.

Link copied
Adding new clients when creating an appointment

To create a new client from the calendar, enter the client's name and select Add Client.

Once you enter the client's information and select Create, the client will be added to your client list, even if the appointment isn't booked.

Link copied
Deleting clients
Important: 

Deleting a client cannot be undone.

To delete a client, open the Clients app and select the client.

Select Delete from the "..." menu.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
